category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: FunctionalityRevisionDisplayNameColumnsShownPref
preference.preference_description: Stores the internal names of BOM Line properties which display names appear as columns from left-to-right in the BOM Panel in the Systems Engineering application. This preference value is only a repository, and it is not to be modified other than by the Product Structure code itself.
